name: System Cleaner
description: Clears Temp, Prefetch, and Log files.
author: Commander

name: Network Scanner
description: Discovers active devices on your local network.
author: Commander

name: Disk Health Report
description: Checks SMART status and free space.
author: Commander

name: WiFi Key Recovery
description: Retrieves saved WiFi passwords.
author: Commander

name: Battery Health
description: Generates a Windows battery health report.
author: Commander

name: Password Generator
description: Generates high-entropy random passwords.
author: Commander

name: Daily Briefing
description: Summary of system status and IP info.
author: Commander

name: Desktop Organizer
description: Sorts desktop files into categorized folders.
author: Commander

name: Hardware Specs Export
description: Exports system hardware info to JSON.
author: Commander

name: Env Var Manager
description: Lists and manages user path variables.
author: Commander

name: Process Monitor
description: Identifies top memory-consuming processes.
author: Commander

name: File Content Searcher
description: Fast text search across local files.
author: Commander

name: Windows Update Force
description: Triggers manual Windows Update check.
author: Commander

name: Automated Zip Backup
description: Zips Documents folder to a timestamped file.
author: Commander

name: Local Port Scanner
description: Checks for common open ports on localhost.
author: Commander

name: Bulk Renamer Pro
description: Batch renames files with a prefix.
author: Commander

name: WSL Disk Compactor
description: Reclaims space from WSL2 virtual disks.
author: Commander

name: Get Public IP
description: Quickly fetches your external IP address.
author: Commander

name: Uptime Checker
description: Shows total system uptime since last boot.
author: Commander

name: Active Connections
description: Lists established network connections.
author: Commander

name: [SEC] Firewall Status
description: Audits Windows Firewall status on all profiles.
author: SecuritySuite

name: [SEC] Unknown Listeners
description: Audits all active network listeners and their processes.
author: SecuritySuite

name: [SEC] DNS Audit
description: Verifies DNS server configurations for hijacking.
author: SecuritySuite

name: [SEC] Startup Audit
description: Lists all programs set to run at startup for persistence checks.
author: SecuritySuite

name: [SEC] Mic/Camera Audit
description: Checks privacy settings for microphone and camera access.
author: SecuritySuite

name: [SEC] Host File Audit
description: Scans Windows Hosts file for unauthorized redirects.
author: SecuritySuite

name: [SEC] Defender Quick Scan
description: Triggers an immediate Windows Defender malware scan.
author: SecuritySuite

name: [SEC] USB History
description: Lists the history of all USB devices connected to the system.
author: SecuritySuite

name: [SEC] Account Audit
description: Lists all local user accounts and their last login times.
author: SecuritySuite

name: [SEC] Proxy Audit
description: Checks for any active system-level proxy configurations.
author: SecuritySuite

name: [SEC] Sharing Audit
description: Lists all active network shares (SMB/CIFS).
author: SecuritySuite

name: [SEC] Unsigned Driver Audit
description: Lists all installed drivers that are not digitally signed.
author: SecuritySuite

name: [SEC] Failed Login Audit
description: Scans Event Logs for failed login attempts in the last 24h.
author: SecuritySuite

name: [SEC] Privacy Hardening
description: Disables Windows telemetry and advertising ID features.
author: SecuritySuite

name: [SEC] Bluetooth Audit
description: Checks for active Bluetooth connections and visibility status.
author: SecuritySuite

name: [SEC] Task Scheduler Audit
description: Lists non-Microsoft scheduled tasks for persistence detection.
author: SecuritySuite

name: [SEC] Clipboard Clear
description: Securely clears the system clipboard memory.
author: SecuritySuite

name: [SEC] File Integrity Check
description: Runs a system file integrity check (SFC).
author: SecuritySuite

name: [SEC] Shadow Copy Audit
description: Audits Volume Shadow Copy storage and status.
author: SecuritySuite

name: [SEC] Defender Update
description: Forces an update of Windows Defender malware signatures.
author: SecuritySuite
